Room.Name: Trantori's Redwood Ledge
Room.ShortDescription: You are on a broad ledge in the interior of a huge redwood tree.
Room.LongDescription: directly overhead there is a trapdoor, and as you look across the empty space between you and the center core of the great tree, you realize there is a door over there. There is no place to stand, but the door seems to open into the heart of the mighty tree, while the trapdoor opens above you.
